channel.title: Utorrent error
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/fc1745.jpg[/img]
this is the error i get from utorrent when i try and load my server
i have done the enviromental variables and they are up to date with my jdk
i run my server first and the server runs fine then i run uttorent and i get that error i have tried the other way round but then my server dosnt run it sais something like port unavailible .. port 43594 already in use?
my fairwall allows incoming connections and uttorent downloads and ect
so i really dont know how to fix it please help

please i need some more help because i cant port foward either

item.title: Utorrent error
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

  1. dont use uttorent .
    portforwarding is a simple progress and takes a few moments.
    Look for guides even if u fix it now , ur uttorent wil crash when to mutch traffic comes.

Read full topic
